design_system_profile.name: Vintage Oenology Luxury
design_system_profile.aesthetic_summary: A sophisticated, high-end identity that pairs deep, textured wine tones with sharp, high-contrast typography. The look is minimalist but dramatic, relying on large-scale serif text and generous negative space.

primary_brand.name: Pantone Vintage Wine
primary_brand.description: A deep, near-black burgundy that replaces standard black for a warmer, richer feel.

background.name: Label Stock Cream
background.description: An off-white, paper-like tone to mimic high-quality wine label stock.

accents.name: Gold Foil (Optional)
accents.usage: Small icon details or thin divider lines

characteristics: Extreme contrast between thick and thin strokes

headline_treatment.layout: Vertical orientation (rotated 90 degrees) or massive horizontal scaling to fill the viewport.

secondary_text.alignment: Aligned to the baseline or cap-height of the massive headline.

composition_strategy.whitespace: Extensive. Text is treated as the primary image.
composition_strategy.rotation: Use vertical text rotation for major headlines to mimic the bottle label aesthetic.
composition_strategy.texture: Clean, flat colors or subtle paper grain texture overlay.

ui_components_context.cards: Flat, sharp corners. No drop shadows. Use borders defined by the 'Vintage Wine' color (1px solid).
ui_components_context.buttons: Ghost buttons (Transparent fill, #3F1521 border, #3F1521 text). Hover: Solid #3F1521 fill, White text.
ui_components_context.icons: Minimalist, heraldic or organic shapes (e.g., small grapes, leaves, crests) in solid fill.
